QuestData.Title: Assault on the Ruins of Kra'nak
QuestData.Description:
The Shadow Council have recruited the Sethekk and other power hungry Arakkoa to their service. Our allies in the Order of the Awakened have tracked them to a ruin in the west of Tanaan where the Shadow Council is instructing them in the use of fel magic.
We must strike at them before they can master their diabolic powers.
QuestData.LogDescription: Assault the Shadow Council forces at the Ruins of Kra'nak in Tanaan Jungle.

Objectives.Objective: Assault the Shadow Council forces at the Ruins of Kra'nak
